verses.verse: God, <S%H430><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> into your inheritance. <S%H5159><s%> They have defiled <S%H2930><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%> They have laid <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in heaps. <S%H5856><s%>

They have given <S%H5414><s%> the dead bodies <S%H5038><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%> to be food <S%H3978><s%> for the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your saints <S%H2623><s%> to the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
Their blood <S%H1818><s%> they have shed <S%H8210><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> There was no one to bury them. <S%H6912><s%>
We have become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> a scoffing <S%H3933><s%> and derision <S%H7047><s%> to those who are around us. <S%H5439><s%>
How long, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh? Will you be angry <S%H599><s%> forever? <S%H5331><s%> Will your jealousy <S%H7068><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire? <S%H784><s%>
Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your wrath <S%H2534><s%> on the nations <S%H1471><s%> that don't <S%H3045><s%> know you; <S%H4467><s%> on the kingdoms that don't <S%H7121><s%> call on your name; <S%H8034><s%>
For they have devoured <S%H398><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and destroyed <S%H8074><s%> his homeland. <S%H5116><s%>

Don't <S%H2142><s%> hold the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of our forefathers <S%H7223><s%> against us. <S%H7356><s%> Let your tender mercies speedily <S%H4118><s%> meet <S%H6923><s%> us, <S%H1809><s%> for we are in desperate <S%H3966><s%> need. <S%H1809><s%>

Help <S%H5826><s%> us, <S%H430><s%> God of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> for <S%H1697><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of your name. <S%H8034><s%> Deliver <S%H5337><s%> us, <S%H3722><s%> and forgive our sins, <S%H2403><s%> for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake.

Why should the nations <S%H1471><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Where is their God? <S%H430><s%>" Let it be known <S%H3045><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> before our eyes, <S%H5869><s%> that vengeance <S%H5360><s%> for your servants <S%H5650><s%>' blood <S%H1818><s%> is being poured out. <S%H8210><s%>

Let the sighing <S%H603><s%> of the prisoner <S%H615><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H1433><s%> According to the greatness of your power, <S%H2220><s%> preserve <S%H3498><s%> those who are sentenced <S%H1121><s%> to death. <S%H8546><s%>

Pay back <S%H7725><s%> to our neighbors <S%H7934><s%> seven <S%H7659><s%> times into their bosom <S%H2436><s%> their reproach <S%H2781><s%> with which they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> you, <S%H136><s%> Lord.

So we, <S%H5971><s%> your people and sheep <S%H6629><s%> of your pasture, <S%H4830><s%> will give you thanks <S%H3034><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> We will praise <S%H8416><s%> you forever, <S%H5769><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
